thread.title: Great hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, great location - Review of Pullman Paris Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ladykf1
title: Great hotel, great location
text: This hotel was amazing. Huge room and located across the street from Montparnasse Station which was great for accessing the subway. Staff were extremely pleasant and very helpful. I would definitely recommend to people looking for a central location and great service.
